properties.entry: SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PW, MEMBER_NM, MEMBER_GENDER, TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DT, 'YYYYMMDD') ENROLL_DT, UNREGISTER_FL FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = ?
SELECT MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_NM, MEMBER_GENDER FROM MEMBER
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEMBER_NM = ?, MEMBER_GENDER = ? WHERE MEMBER_ID = ?
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEMBER_PW = ? WHERE MEMBER_ID = ?
UPDATE MEMBER SET UNREGISTER_FL = 'Y' WHERE MEMBER_PW = ?
